Hopper-related Withering Techs
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Techs/Tech Chains: Hopper-related Withering Techs
By Kurasu Soratobu on Monday, February 26, 2001 - 11:01 pm:

An interesting thing happened with my hopper-raising, while I was trying to get the hot springs. I raised a Snow Hopper, for the singular purpose of getting the spring, and getting moves. However, when I went to get him the Withering techs, I found out that there were no techs he could get, as said by the errantry-fellow, whose name escapes me at this moment. So I continued on, and accidently raised him to A-class, rather than B, forgetting hoppers need to be B to dig the spring. And so, I bred him with a Wracky/Bajarl I had around, to get an Emerald Eye.

However, when I checked my Emerald Eye's movelist, I discovered that he had the move 'Lightning', and that it was a Withering tech. However, it wasn't an 'evil' tech, or a 'good' tech, so I can't blame it on being locked to a certain attitude. The question now becomes: What was locking it to me with the Snow Hopper? If it's a crossover tech, then how come the Bajarl cross gets it, when Bajarls have no lightnnig moves? And if it isn't one, why did the spot say there were no moves to learn at all?

By torey_luvullo on Tuesday, February 27, 2001 - 05:35 am:

well, the tech list for hoppers lists lightning as a move all hoppers can get. i don't know why your snow hopper didnt have it available at errantry.

the second part, what happened with your emerald eye, happens to me a lot. in fact, my new jilt started with flame, despite the fact that neither of her two mothers, a snowy and a draco doll, had this tech. i have even had monsters start out their life with a bad tech [golem/thwack] even though its parents didnt have the tech, and even though the infant golem was best natured...sometimes, the game just assigns your newborn techs at the shrine for reasons i dont quite understand.

anyway, a hopper with lightning is a great opportunity! usually, a hopper's aptitude at gaining int goes to waste...but not with your emerald eye.

By Petit-Trot on Tuesday, February 27, 2001 - 08:17 am:

I raised 2 hoppers and I'm pretty sure I couldn't get any tech in the int errantry. Lightning and flame are the 2 techs that still mystify me. I've asked people and some tell me they are cross breed with either dragon and pixie while others tell me any hopper can get them. I'll certainly look closer next time I raise one.

By alucrdblue on Tuesday, February 27, 2001 - 06:32 pm:

when i raised my skipper (hopper/tiger) the same thing happened to me i tried to get lightning but i couldn't then i bred it to a pixie and got a hopper/pixie with the lightning tech. maybe the hopper int techs can only be gotten through breeding instead of the normal errentry way.

By DiskCatcher on Tuesday, February 27, 2001 - 06:51 pm:

I believe that is so.After combining with my frog hopper it never learned lightning.Then I combined and ...lightning appeared.

By Kurasu Soratobu on Tuesday, February 27, 2001 - 10:28 pm:

I can tell you for sure that it isn't just dragon or just pixie. The Hopper/Bajarl got it just fine. It'd be interesting, though, to think that there's some critters that can only get moves through breeding. This is starting to look like what we're looking at, with hoppers, anyhow. ANd I still haven't seen hide nor hare of 'Flame', for that matter.
